properties.name: batch.web.operations.base
properties.description: URL part to operational methods on batch jobs, like starting, stopping, etc. of jobs

properties.name: batch.web.monitoring.base
properties.description: URL part to monitoring methods on batch jobs, like viewing the state of jobs

properties.name: batch.config.path.xml
properties.description: Location in the classpath where Spring Batch job definitions in XML are picked up

properties.name: batch.config.package.javaconfig
properties.description: Package where Spring Batch job definitions in JavaConfig are picked up

properties.name: batch.defaultprotocol.enabled
properties.description: Whether the default job protocol printed into the log is activated

properties.name: batch.logfileseparation.enabled
properties.description: Whether writing one log file for each job execution is activated

properties.name: batch.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether the transaction safe batch metrics framework is activated so that BatchMetrics may be injected and used

properties.name: batch.metrics.profiling.readprocesswrite.enabled
properties.description: Readers, Processors and Writers are profiled with RichGauges when set to true

properties.name: batch.core.pool.size
properties.description: Core pool size of the thread pool

properties.name: batch.queue.capacity
properties.description: Queue capacity of the task executor

properties.name: batch.max.pool.size
properties.description: Max pool size of the thread pool

properties.name: batch.repository.isolationlevelforcreate
properties.description: Database isolation level for creating job executions

properties.name: batch.repository.tableprefix
properties.description: Prefix for Spring Batch meta data tables
